issue.title: [C++] Migrate remaining flight API to use Resut<>
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16067](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16067). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Convert missing APIs that are not covered by the other subtasks

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16067?focusedCommentId=17514321) by Tobias Zagorni (zagto):*
accidently created this twice by getting an error when clicking create and then clicking create again
